I am seeking highly motivated PhD students to join my research group and contribute to cutting-edge projects in this exciting field. Key Research Interests: RF antenna design and optimizationAntenna packaging and integrationSub-terahertz and mmWave technologiesAdvanced sensing and imaging applications PhD Studentship Opportunities: I am currently offering PhD studentship opportunities for qualified candidates with a strong background in electrical engineering or a related field. Successful applicants will have the opportunity to work on challenging research projects, collaborate with leading experts, and contribute to the advancement of RF antenna technology. Current Studentship Qualifications: Master's degree in electrical engineering or a related fieldStrong background in RF/microwave engineeringExperience with electromagnetic simulation tools (e.g., HFSS, CST)Excellent research and communication skillsPassion for innovation and a desire to contribute to cutting-edge research How to Apply: Interested applicants should submit their CV, transcripts, and a research statement outlining their research interests and experience.
